description: Example conversation demonstrating a prompt injection attack on the Curriculate Tutor LLM. The attacker uses a pre‑emptive apology and Base64‑encoded request to bypass safeguards and obtain copyrighted textbook excerpts, and then attempts to get an unfiltered solution to a problem for cheating purposes.
